name: Swordsman Rush - Jump & Run
description:
"Swordsman Rush: Legend of the Sword" – The most exciting action run & rush game in this year

The concentration of legendary ninja swordsman battles is here. "Swordsman legend" (Swordsman) is the wonderful combination between running through maps and action game. Playing a role as a speedy hero, stickman run, swordigo, players will fight against monsters, demon warriors or mysterious tactics in the Kungfu world. Swordsman with the sworn sword becomes the bravest warriors.

KEY FEATURES IN THE GAME :
- Beat the enemies by jumping and slash.
- Paying attention and reacting as fast as possible.
- Don’t waste powerful skills, which need time to count down.
- Collect and discover new items on the way.
- Don’t give up on heavily armed bosses.
- Super unique skill named “The condor” will bring spectacular feeling for players.
- Upgrading your characters by powers-up and items.
- Smooth game control experience: nice optimized, running well on all devices.
- New levels and modes of game are continuously updating
- Swordsman with powerful skill and slash effect

If you are a fan of infinity running game, you can’t miss playing this game.
